org.onehippo.forge.content.pojo.mapper.jcr.hippo

Class DefaultHippoJcrItemMappingFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.onehippo.forge.content.pojo.common.BasePathBasedContentNodeItemFilter
      • org.onehippo.forge.content.pojo.mapper.jcr.DefaultJcrItemMappingFilter
        • org.onehippo.forge.content.pojo.mapper.jcr.hippo.DefaultHippoJcrItemMappingFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentNodeMappingItemFilter<javax.jcr.Item>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DocumentVariantNodeMappingFilter

    public class DefaultHippoJcrItemMappingFilter
extends DefaultJcrItemMappingFilter
    A ContentNodeMappingItemFilter implementation for Hippo JCR Item, extending DefaultJcrItemMappingFilter, filtering out reference type properties and HippoNodeType.HIPPO_PATHS property by default.
